trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for parts stored in a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: 为存储在 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 中的部分提供基类。

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: 此类为抽象类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> consists of three basic elements:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>三个基本元素组成：

trans-unit.source: Access
trans-unit.target: Access

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the part.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the content stream.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]类型的内容的流。

trans-unit.source: The content data stream of the part.
trans-unit.target: 此部分的内容数据流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)
trans-unit.target: [WPF 中的 Pack URI](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)

trans-unit.source: [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)
trans-unit.target: [开放式打包约定规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> of the part.
trans-unit.target: 此部分的父 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the part, relative to the parent <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> root.
trans-unit.target: 该部分的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，相对于父 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 根。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> class with a specified parent <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package" /> and part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的父 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> 和部分 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 初始化 <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: `partUri` must be valid <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification.
trans-unit.target: `partUri` 必须是有效的<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根据带[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 泛型语法*规范和[开放式打包约定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)规范。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> of the part is not immediately known and will be set later when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreatePart%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数时<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A>部件的立即未知，并且将设置更高版本时<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreatePart%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A> property of the part is initialized to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption.NotCompressed>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A>部件的属性初始化为<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption.NotCompressed>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="package" /> or <paramref name="partUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="package" /> 或 <paramref name="partUri" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> of the part.
trans-unit.target: 此部分的父 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the part, relative to the parent <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> root.
trans-unit.target: 该部分的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，相对于父 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 根。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] content type of the part data stream.
trans-unit.target: 部分数据流的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 内容类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> class with a specified parent <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package" />, part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] content type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的父 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" />、部分 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 内容类型初始化 <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: `partUri` must be valid <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification.
trans-unit.target: `partUri` 必须是有效的<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根据带[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 泛型语法*规范和[开放式打包约定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)规范。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A> property of the part is initialized to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption.NotCompressed>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A>部件的属性初始化为<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CompressionOption.NotCompressed>。

trans-unit.source: `contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7.
trans-unit.target: `contentType` 必须是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]类型格式根据[RFC 2616](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文本传输协议 HTTP*，3.7 节了解。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents.

trans-unit.source: Gets the compression option of the part content stream.

trans-unit.source: The compression option of the part content stream.
trans-unit.target: 部分内容流的压缩选项。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A> is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is open.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A> 是一个只读属性，可以访问仅当父<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A> property is automatically set by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A>属性自动设置<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: After it is set by the constructor, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 它由构造函数中，设置后<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CompressionOption%2A>不能更改。

trans-unit.source: The part has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 已删除此部分。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is open.

trans-unit.source: After it is set by the constructor, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 它由构造函数中，设置后<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A>不能更改。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.ContentType%2A>属性是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]类型格式根据[RFC 2616](http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文本传输协议 HTTP*，3.7 节了解。

trans-unit.source: Creates a part-level relationship between this <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> to a specified target <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> 与指定目标 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> 或外部资源之间的部分级关系。

trans-unit.source: A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource.
trans-unit.target: 部分级关系定义此部分的目标一部分或资源之间的关联。

trans-unit.source: A part-level relationship can be one of two forms.
trans-unit.target: 部分级关系可以是两种形式之一。

trans-unit.source: Between a source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a target <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> inside the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: 源之间<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>到目标<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>内<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>。

trans-unit.source: Between a source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a target resource outside the package.
trans-unit.target: 源之间<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>到包外部的目标资源。

trans-unit.source: In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 在部分关系源部分都视为"所有者"的关系。

trans-unit.source: When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当删除源部分时，还删除拥有的一部分的所有关系。

trans-unit.source: The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way.
trans-unit.target: 创建或删除的关系的过程不会以物理方式更改目标部分或以任何方式的资源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>方法不会以物理方式更改的源部分中，或目标部分或以任何方式的资源。

trans-unit.source: The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系的目标不能为另一个关系。

trans-unit.source: For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 有关包关系的详细信息请参阅部分 1.3*开放式打包约定 (OPC)*规范下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，有关 XPS 文档，请参阅*打开 XML 纸张规范 (XPS)*下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.
trans-unit.target: 目标部件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: For example, <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> if the target part is inside the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />; or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> if the target is a resource outside the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果目标部分在 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> 的内部，则为 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />；如果目标是 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> 外部的资源，则为 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />。

trans-unit.source: The role of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系的角色。

trans-unit.source: Creates a part-level relationship between this <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> to a specified target <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> or external resource.

trans-unit.source: The part-level relationship between this <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> to the target <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> 与目标 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> 或外部资源之间的部分级关系。

trans-unit.source: A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource.
trans-unit.target: 部分级关系定义此部分的目标一部分或资源之间的关联。

trans-unit.source: A part-level relationship can be one of two forms.
trans-unit.target: 部分级关系可以是两种形式之一。

trans-unit.source: Between a source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a target <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> inside the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: 源之间<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>到目标<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>内<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>。

trans-unit.source: Between a source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a target resource outside the package.
trans-unit.target: 源之间<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>到包外部的目标资源。

trans-unit.source: In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 在部分关系源部分都视为"所有者"的关系。

trans-unit.source: When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当删除源部分时，还删除拥有的一部分的所有关系。

trans-unit.source: The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way.
trans-unit.target: 创建或删除的关系的过程不会以物理方式更改目标部分或以任何方式的资源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>方法不会以物理方式更改的源部分中，或目标部分或以任何方式的资源。

trans-unit.source: The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系的目标不能为另一个关系。

trans-unit.source: If `targetMode` is specified as <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>, `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification.
trans-unit.target: 如果`targetMode`指定为<xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>，`targetUri`必须根据格式是相对 URI [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 泛型语法*规范。

trans-unit.source: The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI.
trans-unit.target: 内部的相对 URI 可以是可以是绝对路径开头正斜杠 （"/"） 字符如"/ page1.xaml"或"/ images/picture4.jpg"，或相对路径，如".../ imagespicture1.jpg"可解析根据包根目录 （"/"） 的基 uri。

trans-unit.source: If `targetMode` is specified as <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>, `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification.
trans-unit.target: 如果`targetMode`指定为<xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>，`targetUri`可以是绝对或相对的 URI 格式根据[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 泛型语法*规范。

trans-unit.source: "http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml".
trans-unit.target: "http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml"是一个绝对 URI，它引用的外部的目标资源"page2.xml"的一个示例。

trans-unit.source: "images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself.
trans-unit.target: "images/picture1.jpg"是一个相对的 URI，也引用外部的目标资源"1.jpg"但哪些解析对包本身的 URI 的示例。

trans-unit.source: `relationshipType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification.
trans-unit.target: `relationshipType` 必须是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，形成根据[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符 (URI) 泛型语法*规范。

trans-unit.source: Different package types can define different part-level relationship types.
trans-unit.target: 不同的包类型可以定义不同的部分级关系类型。

trans-unit.target: 返回使用指定 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> 打开的部分内容流。

trans-unit.source: The content stream for the part.
trans-unit.target: 此部分的内容流。

trans-unit.source: The part has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 已删除此部分。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package" /> is not open (<see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> or <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close" /> has been called).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package" /> 没有打开（调用了 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close" />）。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="mode" /> parameter is not a valid <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 参数不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 参数不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mode" /> or <paramref name="access" /> is not compatible with the package and part stream.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 或 <paramref name="access" /> 与包和部分流不兼容。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is specified as <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Read" /> but the <paramref name="mode" /> parameter requires write access.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 参数指定为 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Read" />，但 <paramref name="mode" /> 参数需要写访问权。

trans-unit.source: (<see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> values of <see cref="F:System.IO.FileMode.Create" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.FileMode.CreateNew" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.FileMode.Truncate" />, and <see cref="F:System.IO.FileMode.Append" /> require <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Write" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite" /> access.)
trans-unit.target: （<see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.FileMode.Create" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.FileMode.CreateNew" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileMode.Truncate" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileMode.Append" /> 值需要 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.Write" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite" /> 访问权限。）

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The stream object returned by the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> method of the derived subclass is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 派生子类的 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> 方法返回的流对象是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> internally calls the derived <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> method to actually open and return the part data stream based on the physical format implemented in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> 内部调用派生<see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" />方法实际打开并返回部分数据流基于派生类中实现的物理格式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackagePart" /> subclass implementation of the abstract <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> class is provided and used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackagePart" />子类实现的抽象<see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" />提供和使用类。

trans-unit.source: In the default operation, <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> internally calls <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackagePart" /> class to open and return the part data stream from a ZIP file.
trans-unit.target: 在默认操作中，<see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" />内部调用<see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" />的<see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackagePart" />类以打开并从 ZIP 文件返回部分数据流。

trans-unit.source: The I/O mode in which to open the content stream.
trans-unit.target: 打开内容流时采用的 I/O 模式。

trans-unit.source: The access permissions to use in opening the content stream.
trans-unit.target: 打开内容流时使用的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the part content stream opened with a specified <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> and <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，返回使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileMode" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> 打开的部分内容流。

trans-unit.source: The content data stream of the part.
trans-unit.target: 此部分的内容数据流。

trans-unit.source: Applications should not call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore%2A> directly, but instead should call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不应调用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore%2A>直接，而应调用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The derived <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> implementation should make no assumptions about the order or operations performed by the <see cref="Overload:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream" /> method that calls it.
trans-unit.target: 派生<see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" />实现应作出有关顺序或所执行的操作没有假设<see cref="Overload:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream" />调用它的方法。

trans-unit.source: The derived <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> method is called by the <see cref="Overload:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream" /> methods to open and return the part data stream based on the physical format implemented in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 派生<see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" />方法由调用<see cref="Overload:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream" />方法以打开并返回部分数据流基于派生类中实现的物理格式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackagePart" /> subclass implementation of the abstract <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> class is provided and used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackagePart" />子类实现的抽象<see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" />提供和使用类。

trans-unit.source: In the default operation, <see cref="Overload:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream" /> internally calls <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" /> of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackagePart" /> class to open and return the part data stream from a ZIP file.
trans-unit.target: 在默认操作中，<see cref="Overload:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream" />内部调用<see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStreamCore(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)" />的<see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackagePart" />类以打开并从 ZIP 文件返回部分数据流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> of the part.
trans-unit.target: 获取此部分的父 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />。

trans-unit.source: The parent package of the part.
trans-unit.target: 此部分的父包。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is open.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> 是一个只读属性，可以访问仅当父<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> property is automatically set by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A>属性自动设置<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: After it is set by the constructor, the parent <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> for the part cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数中，父设置完成后<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A>无法更改该部件的。

trans-unit.source: The part has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 已删除此部分。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package" /> is not open (<see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> or <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close" /> has been called).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package" /> 没有打开（调用了 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close" />）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id" /> of the relationship to check for.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的关系的 <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this part owns a relationship with a specified <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，指示此部分是否拥有具有指定 <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id" /> 的关系。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this part owns a relationship with the specified <paramref name="id" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此部分拥有具有指定 <paramref name="id" /> 的关系，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: `id` must be a valid XML identifier.
trans-unit.target: `id` 必须是有效的 XML 标识符。

trans-unit.source: The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)).
trans-unit.target: `id`类型是 xsd:ID 并且必须遵循中规定的命名约定*XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型*规范 (请参阅[ http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/))。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="id" /> is not a valid XML identifier.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 不是有效的 XML 标识符。

trans-unit.source: The part has been deleted.

trans-unit.source: The package is write-only (relationship information cannot be read).
trans-unit.target: 包是只写的（无法读取关系信息）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> property is automatically set by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>属性自动设置<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: After it is set by the constructor, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> of the part cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 它由构造函数中，设置后<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>不能更改的一部分。
